Name: COMM POWER DOWN
checklistText:
COMM POWER DOWN
This will save about 13.0 amps 
	IF VOICE DESIRED 
		UP TLM CMD RESET - RESET THEN OFF
		S-BD AUX TAPE - DN VOICE BU 
		S-BD MODE PCM - OFF 
		PCM BIT RATE - HIGH 
		S-BD PWR AMP - OFF (CTR)
	TAPE RCDR - OFF
	SCE PWR - OFF (CTR)
	cb INSTR ESS MNA & MNB (2) - OPEN (Pnl 5)
	TELCOM GRP 1 & 2 (2) - OFF
